key.name: container-scroll-to-switch-workspace
key.summary: Enable scrolling on the container to switch workspaces.
key.description: If other extensions allow scrolling anywhere on the panel to switch workspaces, enabling this can result in double inputs (one scroll equals two switches). This option exists to prevent such conflicts by allowing you to toggle this behavior.

key.name: middle-click-ignores-clicked-workspace
key.summary: Middle click always opens overview for the current workspace.
key.description: By default, when you middle click on another workspace, it will first switch to it and then open overview, for whichever workspace was selected. This makes it so that until you manually switch to another workspace, middle clicking anywhere in the container opens overview for the current workspace.

key.name: right-click-ignores-clicked-workspace
key.summary: Right click always opens window switcher for the current workspace.
key.description: By default, when you right click on another workspace, it will first switch to it and then open the window switcher, for whichever workspace was selected. This makes it so that until you manually switch to another workspace, right clicking anywhere in the container opens the window switcher for the current workspace.
